flex2.compiler.mxml.lang

Class TextParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • flex2.compiler.mxml.lang.TextParser

  • public abstract class TextParser
extends Object
    MXML text parser, used to parse attribute values and text content. Some utility functionality is also exposed in static methods.
